column1: Ornil was an Elves of Nargothrond who
column3: met Túrin after the Battle of Tumhalad () when they were hurrying back to Nargothrond and leaves were falling from trees in a great wind. Ornil said to Túrin: "Even so fall the people of Nargothrond
column4: but them there shall come no Spring." Nothing more is known of him.
